name: Ptelea
Modalities: Worse: lying on left side; early morning

Head: Temples as if pressed together
Frontal headache; worse, noise, motion, night, rubbing eyes, with acidity
Feels dull and stupid
Pain from forehead to root of nose; pressing-outward pain
Respiratory: Asthma; dyspnoea; cramp-like pain in cardiac region
Feeling of pressure on lungs and of suffocation, when lying on back
Stomach: Constant sensation of corrosion, heat and burning in stomach
Stomach and liver symptoms associated with pain in limbs
Griping in epigastric region, with dryness of mouth
Abdomen: Liver sore, swollen, sensitive to pressure
Much weight and pain in right side; heavy, aching feeling, relieved by lying on right side
Mouth: Tongue coated white or yellow; feels rough, swollen
Excess of saliva, with dry bitter taste
Sleep: Restless, with frightful dreams; nightmare, awakes languid and unrefreshed

details: Is a remarkable remedy in stomach and liver affections. The aching and heaviness in the region of the liver is GREATLY AGGRAVATED BY LYING on the left side. ATONIC STATES OF STOMACH. Asthma.
